activities: Proxibid collects contact information to sign you up as a Buyer or Seller. Buyer information is provided to the individual Sellers when a Buyer applies for participation in one of their auctions.

personaldata: Client data gathered electronically.  Specific data elements are outlined in detail, in the INFORMATION COLLECTED BY PROXIBID section of our Privacy Policy https://www.proxibid.com/asp/PrivacyPolicy.asp
